supporting_spans: Thalcave whistled in a peculiar manner.
Glenarvan thought that he preferred to go on foot, according to the custom of certain guides; and indeed, his long legs ought to have made walking easy.
contradicting_spans: At eight o'clock the next morning Thalcave gave the signal for departure.
reasoning: Contradiction (temporal): The character is not shown to have escaped captivity or returned to the mountains.

analysis.claim_text: Posing as a relay-station hand, he slipped captivity, returned to the mountains and stayed alive with rope-climbing and avalanche-reading skills.

sub_claims.text: He posed as a relay-station hand.
He stayed alive with rope-climbing and avalanche-reading skills.

analysis.reasoning: Contradiction (temporal): The character is not shown to have escaped captivity or returned to the mountains.
